name: Oil Painting
description: Transform the image into a classic Oil Painting, utilizing rich brushstrokes and deep color tones. Achieve a textured, layered look with warm hues and vibrant contrasts throughout.

name: Watercolor
description: Convert the image to a Watercolor style, emphasizing soft, translucent color washes. Allow the edges to blend, creating a fluid and ethereal look.

name: Impressionism
description: Recreate the image in an Impressionist style, using loose brushstrokes to capture light and atmosphere. Integrate vivid colors with natural light and shadow for a lively effect.

name: Cubism
description: Deconstruct the image into Cubism, breaking it into geometric shapes and fragmented forms. Present multiple perspectives through muted color schemes.

name: Pop Art
description: Revamp the image with a Pop Art aesthetic, applying bold, vibrant colors and graphic elements. Focus on high contrast, flat colors, and strong outlines with engaging patterns.

name: Surrealism
description: Transform the image into a Surrealist piece by combining unexpected elements and unusual juxtapositions, fostering a dreamlike and intriguing atmosphere.

name: Expressionism
description: Alter the image to the Expressionism style, using bold, distorted forms and exaggerated colors to evoke intense emotions with dynamic contrasts.

name: Gothic
description: Render the image with a Gothic sensibility, applying dark colors and intricate details. Emphasize dramatic contrasts to create a mysterious and atmospheric effect.

name: Art Nouveau
description: Convert the image to Art Nouveau, featuring flowing, organic lines with elegant forms. Use harmonious colors and nature-inspired patterns throughout the composition.

name: Futurism
description: Infuse the image with Futurist energy, focusing on dynamic movement and modern technological themes. Employ bold lines and vibrant color schemes.

name: Minimalism
description: Simplify the image into a Minimalist style, using a limited color palette. Emphasize clean lines and focus on essential forms for a sleek finish.

name: Abstract Expressionism
description: Reinterpret the image as Abstract Expressionism, employing spontaneous brushstrokes and emphasizing strong color and form with vivid, energetic brushwork.

name: Sketch
description: Transform the image into a Sketch style, using expressive line work and shading. Apply fine lines and hatching techniques to add texture.

name: Pointillism
description: Redefine the image in the style of Pointillism, utilizing distinct dots of color for optical mixing. Highlight texture with a pattern of small dots.

name: Pop Surrealism
description: Adapt the image to Pop Surrealism, blending bold colors with surreal and whimsical elements. Integrate playful and enigmatic qualities.

name: Chiaroscuro
description: Enhance the image with Chiaroscuro, emphasizing dramatic contrasts between light and shadow. Focus on depth, utilizing strong lighting and deep shadows for a striking effect.
